name: Shift. -A Ludum Dare RPG
description:
My entery for Ludum Dame 35. In the Compo challenge you make a game in 48 hours using the provided theme. This Dare's theme was Shapeshifting. I tried to do something I've never done before. Pixel art and making an RPG in construct 2.

I believe it's still quite buggy, sorry, but my time is up and I'm tired.
